message.content:
It is possible to convert the Keurig K-Elite to a pour-over coffee maker, but it would require significant modification and technical knowledge. You would have to disassemble the machine, remove the internal components related to the brewing system, and create a new way for water to be poured manually over coffee grounds in a filter. 

However, this is not recommended as it will void any warranties on your Keurig machine and may lead to damage or malfunction if not done correctly. Additionally, there are many pour-over coffee makers available on the market that are designed specifically for this brewing method and may provide better results.
